snippet: Preparing for an overseas visit, President Obama urged President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia to press Syria’s leader, Bashar al-Assad, to stop attacks against opposition forces.
abstract: Pres Obama calls on Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin to help reduce violence in Syria after peace talks stall in Geneva; conversation with Russian president comes on eve of Obama's trip to Middle East.

byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR and NICK CUMMING-BRUCE
byline.contributor: Michael D. Shear reported from Washington, and Nick Cumming-Bruce from Geneva.

lead_paragraph: Preparing for an overseas visit, President Obama urged President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia to press Syria’s leader, Bashar al-Assad, to stop attacks against opposition forces.

headline.main: Obama Calls on Putin to Help Reduce Violence in Syria After Peace Talks Stall
headline.print_headline: Obama Calls on Putin to Help Reduce Violence in Syria After Peace Talks Stall
